subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Tom Izzo has had unparalleled success over his 17 seasons at Michigan State, but since 2005 he has been unable to defeat Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski, with whom he is close.
snippet: Tom Izzo has had unparalleled success over his 17 seasons at Michigan State, but since 2005 he has been unable to defeat Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski, with whom he is close.
